verses.verse: Moses and Aaron were among His priests, And Samuel was among those who (1 Sam. 7:9; 12:18) called upon His name; They called upon the LORD, and He answered them.
He spoke to them in the cloudy pillar; They kept His testimonies and the ordinance He gave them.
You answered them, O LORD our God; You were to them God-Who-Forgives, Though You took vengeance on their deeds.
Exalt the LORD our God, And worship at His holy hill; For the LORD our God is holy.
A Song of Praise for the LORDâ€™s Faithfulness to His People (Ps. 145:title) A Psalm of Thanksgiving. [1] Make (Ps. 95:1) a joyful shout to the LORD, all you lands!
Serve the LORD with gladness; Come before His presence with singing.

Know that the LORD, He is God; (Job 10:3, 8; Ps. 119:73; 139:13, 14; (Eph. 2:10)) It is He who has made us, and not we ourselves; (Ps. 95:7; (Is. 40:11); Ezek. 34:30, 31) We are His people and the sheep of His pasture.
(Ps. 66:13; 116:17-19) Enter into His gates with thanksgiving, And into His courts with praise. Be thankful to Him, and bless His name.
